text: How about Greek letters in the mostly useless MacBook Pro Touch Bar in VSC? I see some extensions for touch bar, but not one with extra letters… I’d also take shortcuts for things like |>.

text: the touchbar is mostly useless to me anyways, except the touch ID. No physical feedback is really unhandy
